snippet: Twenty-eight minutes of video emerge, recorded by a witness to Monday’s deadly clashes in Cairo, that appear to offer the first clear images of the predawn phase of the confrontation.
abstract: Twenty-eight minutes of video emerge, recorded by a witness to Monday’s deadly clashes in Cairo, that appear to offer the first clear images of the predawn phase of the confrontation.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and LIAM STACK

headline.main: New Video Appears to Show How Predawn Raid Unfolded in Cairo

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
